Uses of Class
core.TilePanel

Packages that use TilePanel
core   
 

Uses of TilePanel in core
 

Methods in core that return TilePanel
 TilePanel MapperFrame.getObjectPanel()
          Gets the TilePanel object (for objects) currently associated with this MapperFrame
 TilePanel MapPanel.getObjectPanel()
          Gets the object panel associated with this MapPanel
 TilePanel Tile.getParentTilePanel()
          Gets the TilePanel to which this Tile belongs
 TilePanel MapperFrame.getTilePanel()
          Gets the TilePanel object (for tiles) currently associated with this MapperFrame
 TilePanel MapPanel.getTilePanel()
          Gets the tile panel associated with this MapPanel
 

Methods in core with parameters of type TilePanel
 void MapperFrame.setObjectPanel(TilePanel panel)
          Sets the TilePanel object(for objects) of this MapperFrame
 void MapperFrame.setTilePanel(TilePanel panel)
          Sets the TilePanel object(for tiles) of this MapperFrame
 

Constructors in core with parameters of type TilePanel
MapPanel(MapperFrame parentFrame, int xTiles, int yTiles, TilePanel tilePanel, TilePanel objectPanel)
          Constructs the panel which tiles are to be drawn to
Tile(java.awt.Image eraseTile, TilePanel tilePanel, int id)
          This constructs a drawable tile to be displayed on a TilePanel which can be added to a TilePanel
